entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 early this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
